text: Tara mithya sunate khuba'i agrahasila ebam abaidha sampada kha'oyate atyanta asakta [1]; sutaram tara yadi apanara kache ase tabe tadera bicara nispatti karabena ba taderake upeksa karabena [2]. Apani yadi taderake upeksa karena tabe tara apanara kono ksati karate parabe na. Ara yadi bicara nispatti karena tabe tadera madhye n'yaya bicara karabena [3]; niscaya'i allaha n'yayaparayanaderake bhalobasena
